name: Little Hurricane

weaponEffects.title: Physical resonance
weaponEffects.description: Physical Resonance: Increase Physical ATK by **20%** and Physical Resistance by **40%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more Physical weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

weaponEffects.title: Balanced elements
weaponEffects.description: Increase final damage by **15%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more weapons of the same element, except for Physical weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot.

advancements: The shatter of **Treasure Digging**, **Octopus Ball Boiling Pot** and **Xiaopi Opens the Road** is increased by **80%**. When your shield is less than **50%** of max HP, using the previously mentioned skills will apply a shield equal to **50%** of max HP and lasts for **8** seconds. Can only be triggered once every **5** seconds. (Does not take effect in Apex League)
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.
The limit of Xiaopi's shatter and touching the courtyard is increased to **45**. After releasing Xiaopi's big trick, physical damage dealt is increased by **25%** for **30** seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.

After triggering treasure mark, refresh the duration of the target's serious injury state. When dealing damage to a target whose HP is lower than **80%**, physical damage dealt is increased by **25%**. This effect works in the background.
The damage caused by treasure mark is increased by **140%** of ATK.

abilities.name: Chong Chong
abilities.description: When on the ground, use Little Hurricane to attack 5 times.

abilities.name: Turning Attack
abilities.description: While airborne, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row and consume endurance.

abilities.name: Treasure Digging
abilities.description: When on the ground, press and hold normal attack after the first to third normal attack to trigger Treasure Digging. Continue to attack enemies in front of you while consuming stamina. During this skill, you will gain hyperbody, and each hit will deal damage equal to **90.1**% of ATK + **5** to nearby targets, and apply the Serious Injury state to the target.

abilities.name: Octopus Ball Boiling Pot
abilities.description: During Treasure Digging, keep holding normal attack to trigger Octopus Ball Boiling Pot. Deal damage to enemies in front of you while consuming stamina. During this skill, you will gain hyperbody. Each hit will deal damage equal to **90.1%** of ATK + **5** to nearby targets. After releasing, it will damage nearby targets by **135.1%** of ATK + **7**, and applies the Serious Injury state to the target. Lasts **7** seconds, and use the arrow keys to move arround while Octopus Ball Boiling Put lasts.

abilities.name: Xiaopi Opens the Way
abilities.description: When on the ground, press and hold normal attack or press and hold normal attack after the 4th normal attack to trigger Xiaopi Opens the Way. Move forward and continue to attack enemies in front, while consuming stamina. During this period, you will gain hyperbody, and each hit deals damage equal to **90.1%** of ATK + **5** to nearby targets and applies the Serious Injury state to them. Lasts for **7** seconds, and use the arrow keys to move arround while Xiaopi opens the way.

abilities.name: Tornado Smash
abilities.description: Press and hold normal attack while in the air to trigger the Tornado Smash. Falling from the sky, after landing, deal damage equal to **418%** of ATK + **22** to nearby targets and launch them.

abilities.name: Whistleback
abilities.description:
Within a short period of time after dodging, press normal attakc to attack nearby targets dealing damage equal to **94.4%** of ATK + **5**.
Passive: Slow enemies hit by **60%**, and lower their attack by **30%** for **5** seconds. Can be triggered once every **10** seconds. (does not take effect in Apex League)

abilities.name: Chasing Arm
abilities.description: Dodge while moving and press normal attack to trigger Chasing Arm, dealing damage equal to **265.6%** of ATK + **14** to nearby targets.

abilities.name: Dodge
abilities.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger a Phantasia, cooldown 15 seconds, reducing the speed of enemies within an area. Become immune to hitstun for **0.5** seconds while dodging.

abilities.name: Expedition Team Attack
abilities.description:
Enter the state of charging, gain temporary invincibility (does not take effect in Apex League), absorb nearby targets and deal damage equal to **81.1%** of ATK + **4** each time it hits.
Cooldown: **20** seconds (you can start charging while on cooldown). After releasing it, detonate the treasure marks of all stacks applied on nearby enemies, and make Xiaopi handle the weapon, increasing attack speed by **100%**, lasts for **12** seconds.

Based on the amount of small octopuses on your head while charging, there are different effects.
**2** octopuses: Complete rampage: Deal damage equal to **1200%** of ATK + **63**.
**1** or **3** octopuses: Incomplete Rampage: Deal damage equal to **840%** of ATK + **44** to nearby targets.

Crouching things: When entering combat, gain **15** split tentacles. The split tentacles will attack the currently locked target in range, dealing **125%** of ATK, and consumes **1** split tentacle. Can stack up to **30** split tentacles. When split tentacles hit the target, apply **1** stack of Treasure Mark to the target, lasting for **20** seconds and stacking up to **3** times. Dealing physical damage other than the split tentacles will detonate **1** stack of Treasure Mark, dealing damage equal to **70%** of ATK, can be triggered once every **0.1** seconds. Dealing damage with the discharge skill of any weapon, will give **1** stack of split tentacles. Can only be triggerd once every second.

abilities.name: Xiaopi's Big Trick
abilities.description: When the weapon is fully charged or Phantasia is triggered, switch from another weapon to this weapon to remove all debuffs from the user, and dive underwater for a short time. When you jump out, deal damage equal to **480%** of ATK + **25** to nearby targets. After landing, deal damage equal to **1120%** of ATK + **59**, and increase the amount of split tentacles to the maximum (**30**). Gain immunity for **2.6** seconds. (does not take effect in Apex League)

recommendedMatrices.name: Gunonno
recommendedMatrices.description: Great set for both a physical and rainbow comp. 4 set only on Gunonno.

recommendedMatrices.name: Shiro
recommendedMatrices.description: Great set effects for both shatter and consistent damage increase. Use 4 set for quick fights, otherwise pair with 2-set Samir or 2-set Crow.

recommendedMatrices.name: Crow
recommendedMatrices.description: High damage matrix set when you have high crit rate.

recommendedMatrices.name: Samir
recommendedMatrices.description: Little Hurricane will have no problem maintaining the damage buff with its fast attacks.

recommendedMatrices.name: Sobek
recommendedMatrices.description: A good substitute for SSR damage chips if you don't have them. Very useful against groups of mobs, i.e. in Bygone Phantasm.
